name: LastCover
tagline: Last.fm album art fetcher for the iTunes. (Obsolete. Didn't update it for Music.app)
body: ### Long time ago in a galaxy far away > When I switched to macOS and iTunes there was no free album art downloader, > which was able to find more than 1/10 arts for my music library. But almost all arts are available on last.fm. > So, meet [LastCover](http://github.com/sumerman/LastCover) â€“ the Last.fm based album art fetcher for iTunes. ### Nowdays Last.fm is mostly dead, and iTunes was superseded by the Music.app. Those were good times ðŸ˜” ### Contributions - Author: Valeriy Meleshkin (twitter) - Icon: Janko Jovanovic. I found it here
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
